Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Club (+5 1d6 B R10'; strength; expert); Greatclub (+5 1d10 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+8 1d4 P/S; dexterity; expert)

Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise a Shield to absorb damage from a melee Strike
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
